lines.text: Why, you poor white trash! If it wasn't for that gun, you'd be a yellow-streaked bum!

[to Mrs Turner]
I'm running the show, Deputy Dawg!
The measure of a man is dignity.
The measure of a man is POWER!

[to Ted Turner]
Repeat after me..."Yes sir massah Kane sir, all of us black-ass coons is hungry!"

[after ordering Floyd to sit in the kindling]
Damned if you don't look like you belong there.
Why you, little coon! You're a nigger in the woodpile!
